mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.qualification AS "qualification", a.name AS "name", a.next_role_id AS "nextRoleId", a.status AS "status", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN system_operator_role b ON a.create_by = b.operator_id LEFT JOIN system_role c ON b.role_id = c.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bobogou_basic_qualification( id, qualification, name, next_role_id, status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag )VALUES ( #{id}, #{qualification}, #{name}, #{nextRoleId}, #{status}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bobogou_basic_qualification SET qualification = #{qualification}, name = #{name}, next_role_id = #{nextRoleId}, status = #{status}, create_by = #{createBy.id}, create_date = #{createDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, del_flag = #{delFlag} WHERE id=#{id}
UPDATE bobogou_basic_qualification SET del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_DELETE} WHERE id=#{id}
UPDATE bobogou_basic_qualification SET del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} WHERE id=#{id}
